title: Magic Face T5-Golden Age
summary: The most beautiful mechanical watch face with gears wheeling around  Interactive
description: Golden Age－Classic,luxury and elegant. The most beautiful Magic Face ever.Feature:-Golden and platinum theme.-Extremely analog watch face with every piece polished carefully-The gears revolve just like real tourbillons-Exclusive design for high resolution smart watches like Huawei Watch, no more blur imagesInteractive version.(Apart from small indicator on the lift to Weather&Steps, Tap small icon to get :Steps:1:New clear, uncluttered designed personal step-info center.2:Weekly step curve tell how much you have done in past 6 days with current steps and distance info.3:Curve color changes from red to green depends on your actual steps. 4:Swipe down the page to check your whole activity history.Weather:1:Current Weather info page with details of coming 3 days2:Swipe down the page to get Weather forecast for 16 days !Magic Face T5-Golden Age is a timeless masterpiece inspired by many traditional luxury watches, beautiful, elegant, and interactive. Sometimes when you look at it, you could probably think you are wearing a real mechanical watch instead of a digital gadget on your wrist.More facesIf you like T5-Golden Age, feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the winners’ original watch faces will be here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platformYou can also search magic face  to find more of our works.Supported Devices:T5-Golden Agen supports all Android Wear smartwatches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.About us:We are a small Chinese team dedicated in creating original watch faces.We are the exclusive watch face partner of Tencent, China’s NO.1 internet company.We also have a close relationship with Mobvoi, the Chinese AI company invested by Google.Contact us:If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:magicwatchface@gmail.comOr join our community: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809Website:http://www.magicwatchface.com/Twitter：https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface
descriptionHTML:
Golden Age－Classic,luxury and elegant. The most beautiful Magic Face ever.

Feature:
-Golden and platinum theme.
-Extremely analog watch face with every piece polished carefully
-The gears revolve just like real tourbillons
-Exclusive design for high resolution smart watches like Huawei Watch, no more blur images

Interactive version.(Apart from small indicator on the lift to Weather&Steps, Tap small icon to get :

Steps:
1:New clear, uncluttered designed personal step-info center.
2:Weekly step curve tell how much you have done in past 6 days with current steps and distance info.
3:Curve color changes from red to green depends on your actual steps.
4:Swipe down the page to check your whole activity history.

Weather:
1:Current Weather info page with details of coming 3 days
2:Swipe down the page to get Weather forecast for 16 days !

Magic Face T5-Golden Age is a timeless masterpiece inspired by many traditional luxury watches, beautiful, elegant, and interactive. Sometimes when you look at it, you could probably think you are wearing a real mechanical watch instead of a digital gadget on your wrist.

More faces
If you like T5-Golden Age, feel free to try our new watch face platform Magic Watchface, all the winners’ original watch faces will be here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.magicwatchface.platform
You can also search magic face to find more of our works.

Supported Devices:
T5-Golden Agen supports all Android Wear smartwatches, Moto 360, Huawei Watch, LG Watch Urbane, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, TAG Heuer Connected, Fossil Q Founder, Sony Smartwatch3 & Asus ZenWatch.

About us:
We are a small Chinese team dedicated in creating original watch faces.
We are the exclusive watch face partner of Tencent, China’s NO.1 internet company.
We also have a close relationship with Mobvoi, the Chinese AI company invested by Google.

Contact us:
If you have any questions or concerns about Magic Watchface please email us:
magicwatchface@gmail.com

Or join our community:
https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/101834176717677614896

Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/pages/Magic-watchface/447796408708809

http://www.magicwatchface.com/

https://twitter.com/MagicWatchface
